como sea, pueda que no les ande el juego.. van a su biblioteca, luego half life 2 ep 2 y le cliquean a la rueda o engrane, luego en general, al final de esa seccion escriben en un cuadro que dice opciones de lanzamiento e ingresan el sig codigo 
"-dxlevel 81" 
(sin las comillas) esto es por el directx tiene diferentes configuraciones o algo asi que no alcance a entender del todo :P

esta en algun foro de ayuda de steam, pero es complicado explicarle al google que no funciona.. ireinstalando el juego no lo soluciona

aparte de eso, los juegos de valve son geniales, tanto half como portal, son lo mejor que ha creado valve!

Was a good game... little short and the final showdown gets a little repetitive.... but still cool to be going mental in the car... splatter bonus.

Great game, if too short.  And obviously, blue balls all around.  

Big hint for the end battle - use the car to run over the hunters.

The directors commentary with Merle made me actually cry. Knowing how much she put into this game and knowing that she wasnt invited to be Alyx in HLX makes it all such a moving experience. The greatest video game of all time with the greatest cliffhanger of all time and it never got a conclusion off the ground. An experience you can't describe in words. It speaks for itself

Play through it and then replay it with the commentary. Riveting
